meanings.definition: To undergo a gradual transformation or change in form
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was slowly morphing into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The tadpole is morphing into a frog.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin seemed to be morphing into a carriage - just like in a fairy tale!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were morphing into a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The landscape was morphing before our eyes, changing colors with the setting sun.

meanings.definition: The process of transforming or changing in form
meanings.sent1: The morphing of the chrysalis into a butterfly was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: Digital artists use morphing to create seamless transitions between images.
meanings.sent3: The morphing of the clouds into different shapes entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The morphing of the seasons from winter to spring is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The morphing of the caterpillar into a butterfly symbolizes growth and change.

meanings.definition: The act of morphing or being morphed
meanings.sent1: The morphing of the characters in the movie was done seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The special effects team worked on the morphing for weeks.
meanings.sent3: The sudden morphing of the cake into a different flavor surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The morphing of the city skyline at night was like a magical transformation.
meanings.sent5: The morphing of the old building into a modern structure was a sight to behold.
